org.kiy0taka.dbunit

Annotation Type DbUnitTest


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface DbUnitTest
    DbUnit test method annotation.
    Author:
    kiy0taka

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String init
      Initial dataset file.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String[] excludeColumns
      Exclude column names.
      String expected
      Expected dataset file.
      String nullValue
      Convert this value to null.
      DbUnitTest.Operation operation
      Database setup operation.
      boolean rtrim
      Right trim String value.
      DbUnitTest.Sort sort
      Sort data set.
      String[] sql
      Execute update before setup dataSet.

    • Element Detail

      • init

        public abstract String init
        Initial dataset file.

      • expected

        public abstract String expected
        Expected dataset file.
        Default:
        ""

      • operation

        public abstract DbUnitTest.Operation operation
        Database setup operation.
        Default:
        org.kiy0taka.dbunit.DbUnitTest.Operation.CLEAN_INSERT

      • excludeColumns

        public abstract String[] excludeColumns
        Exclude column names. (i.e. {"empno", "emname"} or {"emp.empno", "dept.deptno"})
        Default:
        ""

      • nullValue

        public abstract String nullValue
        Convert this value to null.
        Default:
        ""

      • rtrim

        public abstract boolean rtrim
        Right trim String value.
        Default:
        false

      • sort

        public abstract DbUnitTest.Sort sort
        Sort data set.
        Default:
        org.kiy0taka.dbunit.DbUnitTest.Sort.AUTO

      • sql

        public abstract String[] sql
        Execute update before setup dataSet.
        Default:
        ""
